headline.print_headline: Do It Live: Surgery, Burial, Exorcism
headline.main: Brain Surgery, Burial, Exorcism: They’ll Do It Live

snippet: The National Geographic, A&E and Destination America cable channels will run live shows next week featuring individuals under stressful circumstances.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger Critic's Notebook expresses skepticism about value of sensationalistic live TV programs such as National Geographic Channel's Brain Surgery Live With Mental Floss, Destination America's Exorcism: Live! and A&E’s Fear: Buried Alive.
lead_paragraph: The National Geographic, A&E and Destination America cable channels will run live shows next week featuring individuals under stressful circumstances.
